name: Roundabounce
description:
Welcome to Roundabounce, a top down pool/pinball game built in Unity 3d.

This game was built for the PitiIT Community Jam 2.

I also followed a few of the additional special rules: 

Me no read, no write - Don't use any words to communicate anything (text allowed only in menu, not even in tutorial)

Minimalistic - All game in one scene

That's my voice line - Make every sound effect using your voice

One hand friendly - Design your game to make it playable with only one hand

I also tried to create a game with the widest audience possible, such that a two-year-old may enjoy it, while also providing some scoring and timing elements to interest those more  inclined to speed run a game.
